docna.cdata!:
Paraguay - Vocational Training Project :
            Loan 1252 - Loan Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Paraguay - Vocational Training
            Project : Loan 1252 - Loan Agreement - Conformed

abstracts.cdata!:
The project comprises: (a) expansion
            (construction, furnishing and equipping) of vocational
            training centers in Asuncion and San Lorenzo, increasing the
            existing capacity from 205 to 545 trainee places; (b)
            construction of four new vocational training centers in
            Hernandarias (Itaipu), Encarnacion (Yacyreta), Chore and
            Coronel Oviedo providing 495 trainee places; (c) two mobile
            training units and twenty-four sets of equipment and
            transport for about 1,500 trainees; and (d) technical
            assistance comprising; (i) 7 man-years of expert services
            and 3 man-years of fellowships for management training; (ii)
            3 man-years of expert services for in-plant training; (iii)
            1/2 man-year of expert services for equipment specification;
            and (iv) 2-1/2 man-years of fellowships to train supervisors
            of regional centers.
